column2: Unionism is a religion that venerates the divinely guided Regalian emperors and integrates the gods of conquered peoples to promote order and stability.
Estelley is a predominantly elven religion centered on self-betterment, personal spiritual growth under the guidance of its empress goddesses.

Draconism is a faith devoted to dragons, immortal, world-maintaining beings, whose worship centers less on moral doctrine and more on accompanying these dragons in sustaining and protecting the world.
Fornoss is a religion that venerates deities tied to ancestral survival and identity. Honor plays an important part of this religion.

Evolism is a faith devoted to powerful, alignment-transcending dark gods from other realms who teach harsh cosmic truths and urge followers to pursue self-serving transformation into a higher form through magic.
Khama is an ancient polytheistic faith originating in the Dewamenet empire. It teaches karmic balance and dutiful service to its gods.
